means: 士兵，军人( soldier的名词复数 )

sentence.Network_en: French soldiers squared off with a gunman at a road checkpoint.
sentence.Network_cn: 在一个公路检查站法国士兵摆开架势，准备迎战一名持枪者。

sentence.Network_en: There is a certain impatience among some of the soldiers.
sentence.Network_cn: 有些士兵有点儿不耐烦。

sentence.Network_en: Soldiers took away four people one of whom was later released.
sentence.Network_cn: 士兵们抓走4个人，其中1个随后被放了回来。

PerfectNetExp.abs: A monument was erected as a memorial the dead soldiers ., 为纪念阵亡将士建立了纪念碑.
with an old hunter leading the way , the soldiers started towards the forest ., 由一位老猪人带路 , 士兵们朝着森林走去.
terrorists sniping at soldiers from well-concealed positions从十分隐蔽的位置伏击士兵的恐怖分子。
this monument was built in honor of soldiers ., 这座纪念碑是为了纪念战士们而修建的.

entry.def: A soldier is a person who works in an army, especially a person who is not an officer.
